dynSentence.name: QrythreadpoolInf
dynSentence.sentence: SELECT LOG_NO,MNT_ID ,TIME_COST,region,NOD_NM,MON_TYP,MON_DAT,REMARK,MNT_DT,MNT_TM FROM montdumpjnl A ,(select region as reg,NOD_NM as nod,NVL(MAX(CAST(CONCAT(MNT_DT,MNT_TM) as integer)), 0) as max_tim from montdumpjnl where MON_TYP='THREADPOOL' and (REGION='%s' or '%s '=' ') and (NOD_NM='%s' or '%s '=' ') GROUP BY REGION , NOD_NM) B where A.MON_TYP='THREADPOOL' AND A.region=B.reg AND A.NOD_NM=B.nod AND CONCAT(A.MNT_DT,MNT_TM) =B.max_tim

dynSentence.name: QryComExecInf
dynSentence.sentence: SELECT LOG_NO,MNT_ID ,TIME_COST,region,NOD_NM,MON_TYP,MON_DAT,REMARK,MNT_DT,MNT_TM FROM montdumpjnl A ,(select region as reg,NOD_NM as nod,NVL(MAX(CAST(CONCAT(MNT_DT,MNT_TM) as integer)), 0) as max_tim from montdumpjnl where MON_TYP in('EXEC','FUNC') and (REGION='%s' or '%s '=' ') and (NOD_NM='%s' or '%s '=' ') GROUP BY REGION , NOD_NM) B where A.MON_TYP in ('EXEC','FUNC') AND A.region=B.reg AND A.NOD_NM=B.nod AND CONCAT(A.MNT_DT,MNT_TM) =B.max_tim

dynSentence.name: Qry_ALM_RUL2
dynSentence.sentence: Select CONCAT(ltrim(rtrim(b.RES_TYP)),'.',ltrim(rtrim(b.ATTR_NM))) ALM_RUL from MNGTMNTATTR b where b.MNT_ID='%s' and TRH_ID !=' ' order by ALM_RUL
